meanings.definition: A very large number, equivalent to 10 raised to the power of 100.
meanings.sent1: There are googols of stars in the sky.
meanings.sent2: She had a googols of toys in her room.
meanings.sent3: The amount of cookies on the table was a googols!
meanings.sent4: His love for her was like a googols, immeasurable and infinite.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was filled with a googols of gold coins.

meanings.sent1: The factory produced a googols of shoes every day.
meanings.sent2: They had a googols of fun at the amusement park.
meanings.sent3: The number of balloons at the party was a googols!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like a googols, filling every corner.
meanings.sent5: The library contained a googols of books, each waiting to be read.
